g.text: Suppose you are offered a job that lasts one month. Which
of the following methods of payment do you prefer?
±. One million dollars at the end of the month.
One cent on the Irst day of the month, two cents on the
second day, four cents on the third day, and, in general,
on a coordinate grid where the unit of measurement is
1 inch. Show that, at a distance 2 ft to the right of the origin,
the height of the graph of
is 48 ft but the height of the
ing both functions in several viewing rectangles. Find all
points of intersection of the graphs correct to one decimal
place. Which function grows more rapidly when
Use a graph to estimate the values of
A researcher is trying to determine the doubling time for
a culture in a nutrient solution and estimates the bacteria
count every four hours. His data are shown in the table.
Make a scatter plot of the data.
Use a graphing calculator to Ind an exponential curve
Graph the model from part (b) together with the scatter
plot in part (a). Use the TRACE feature to determine
how long it takes for the bacteria count to double.
A bacteria culture starts with 500 bacteria and doubles in
How many bacteria are there after 3 hours?
How many bacteria are there after
How many bacteria are there after 40 minutes?
Graph the population function and estimate the time
±f a sample has a mass of 200 mg, Ind the amount
Estimate the amount remaining after 3 weeks.
Use a graph to estimate the time required for the mass
Na, has a half-life of 15 hours. A
sample of this isotope has mass 2 g.
Find the amount remaining after 60 hours.
Estimate the amount remaining after 4 days.
Use a graph to estimate the time required for the mass
in Figure 11 to estimate the half-life
of the viral load of patient 303 during the Irst month of
After alcohol is fully absorbed into the body, it is metabo-
lized with a half-life of about 1.5 hours. Suppose you have
had three alcoholic drinks and an hour later, at midnight,
your blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is 0.6 mg
Find an exponential decay model for your BAC
Graph your BAC and use the graph to determine when
you can drive home if the legal limit is 0.08 mg
Adapted from P. Wilkinson et al., “Pharmacokinetics of Ethanol after
Oral Administration in the Fasting State,”

capability to model the population of the world with the
